routes.documentation: Enforcement Criminal Case Summary Report Search

responses.label: Returns a complex object containing detailed criminal case information for the provided Case Identifier.

routes.documentation: Enforcement Criminal Case Summary Report Search

responses.label: Returns a complex object containing detailed criminal case information for the provided Case Identifier.
Results are a comma separated value (CSV) file.
Results are a comma separated value (CSV) file.
Results
Results
Results are either an array of State, County, Zip Code facility cluster map coordinates or individual facility coordinates.  Coordinates provided are in WGS84.
Results are either an array of State, County, Zip Code facility cluster map coordinates or individual facility coordinates.  Coordinates provided are in WGS84.

routes.documentation: ECHO ICIS Law Sections Lookup Service

responses.label: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.
